As I was Re-reading from the beginning, I've realized how submissive she is. The wife/FMC seems to think that she doesn't want it, but subconsciously wants the sex. She said she doesn't want it, but due to her husband's lack of libido, she's never experienced a hard fuck. When she does experience it, she turns down her husband's request for sex probably because she knows she won't cum. So instead of talking or seeking help from her husband, she instead seeks to just continue on cheating (by will now) so she doesn't lose her house to live in, food that her husband provides for (I mean, they work at the same place, but if he has to move to another location, I would assume he's a manager), and the free fuck from her co-worker/husband's subordinate. I'm sort of disgusted with the wife, but I keep on reading on "hoping" she gets her ass left in the dust by her husband, so she can pay her bills by becoming the whore she is. But I also know, there is a 0.1% chance of that happening.
Moar, i need moar before the translation
